mapper.select: SELECT u.USERS_ID id, u.USERS_NAME userAccount, u.USERS_PWD pwd, u.USERS_WORK_ID userName, u.USERS_FLAG userFlag, u.DEPT_ID deptId, u.BASE_ID baseId, u.LEVELID levelId, u.HR_ID hrAccount, d.DEPTNAME deptName FROM MES_USERS u,MES_HR_DEPARTMENT d WHERE u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPTID(+) AND u.USERS_NAME=#{userAccount}

SELECT DISTINCT s.ID id, s.R_CODE resourceCode, s.R_URLPATTERN urlPattern, s.R_TYPE resourceType, s.R_DESC name, s.R_PID parentId, r.ROLE_NAME role FROM MES_RESOURCE s,ROLE_RESOURCE rs ,ROLES r WHERE s.ID=rs.RESOURCEID AND r.ROLE_ID=rs.ROLEID
SELECT R.ROLE_NAME ROLE FROM MES_USERS U, USER_ROLE UR, ROLES R WHERE U.USERS_ID=UR.USERS_ID AND R.ROLE_ID=UR.ROLE_ID AND U.USERS_NAME=#{userAccount}
